quote: The only reason they use you is because you happen to be in front of them when they're buying or selling.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the common belief that trust is the primary reason clients choose agents.
suggested_hook: Ever wonder why clients really choose you as their REALTOR?

quote: Your expectations are the cause of almost all your disappointment.
why_clipworthy: Encourages listeners to reevaluate their expectations to reduce stress.
suggested_hook: Could your expectations be holding you back?
